articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: OpenAI makes ChatGPT's accessible without requiring sign ups - Reuters
articles.description: OpenAI will start allowing users to access its free-to-use ChatGPT generative AI chatbot without needing to sign up for the service beginning Monday, the Microsoft -backed startup said on Monday.

articles.title: New Quest apps will be unable to support Oculus Quest 1 headsets from May - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: Oculus Quest 1 was released in 2019 and Meta announced they were ending support for the device last year. Come May, new apps won't even be allowed on it.
